book.synopsys: Setting Up Your Development Environment -- Debuggers And Debugger Design -- Building A Windows Debugger -- Pydbg : A Pure Python Windows Debugger -- Immunity Debugger : The Best Of Both Worlds -- Hooking -- Dll And Code Injection -- Fuzzing -- Sulley -- Fuzzing Windows Drivers -- Dapython---scripting Ida Pro -- Pyemu---the Scriptable Emulator. By Justin Seitz. Includes Bibliographical References And Index.
